transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, Naseem ji, aap meeting mein thi to main aapka call nahi utha payi. Sandeep boliye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, main aapko pichle iske maine call kiya hai.
Customer: Sandeep.
Executive: Ji. Aap kya bol rahe hain?
Executive: Aapka call aaya hua tha isliye kiya hai. Maine sir se baat ki hai na sir main.
Customer: Achcha, Sandeep. Ji. Haan, Alok sir se baat kari hai aapne?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji. Matlab unhi ke baare mein baat kar rahi hai.
Executive: Main aapka baat kar rahi hu aapki servicing ke liye. Ye aapne jo leads yaha pe unmark kar diye hain. Hame ye theek karna hoga sir, jab aapki woh jaise one click karenge kyunki even if aapne star le rakha hai usme achcha khasa lead aapka lead ka balance aata hai aapka. Woh aap dhang se use nahi kar paoge agar ye filters nahi lagaye toh. Kyunki wohi hai na ki agar aapke lead mein agar main dekhu.
Customer: Aawaz sahi se nahi aa rahi madam aap.
Executive: Sabhi ki aawaz aa rahi hai koi customer care pe jaise pure pure.
Executive: Haan ji, ab bataiye ab aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, ab aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji. Haan ji, haan ji. Main ye bol rahi hu ki even if aapne star le rakha hai na toh agar aapne ye filter nahi lagaye, filter nahi lagaye toh even if aapke product mein hazar hazar woh ho diye har mahine aap usko aap khud samajh rahe ho aapki profile pe hum achanak se hazar toh nahi dikha sakte na. Toh woh dheere dheere karke aayegi. Toh wohi wali baat hai ki ye wali filter lagane ki zaruri hai toh jitna bhi aapka data fetch hua hai.
Executive: Us hisab se jitni bhi locations pe aapko issue aaye, jitni bhi leads pe aapko issue aaye ye filter lagane bahut zaruri hai. Toh aap mujhe ye bataiye. Pehle main aapse yehi puchh sakti hu. Links. Customer voice aapka natural Naseem.
Executive: Ek second dijiyega mujhe bas.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek toh aapka ye jo kya naam filter lagwaya tha ye toh sunne mein ko aisa lag raha hai maine filter lagwaya tha. Maine aapko bola tha aap pan India aapka pan India kaam karte ho ya phir wohi hai aapka? Kahi kahi jagah. Pan India tha na aapka toh?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi city wala hi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi kuch kuch jagah tha marble ki cheeze aapki toot tootna jaise aapne door door mein kara hua tha.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ji ji. Theek hai. Toh ye aapka aapko ye pata hai aap kitni cities mein deal karte ho?
Customer: India mein kai 100 mein.
Executive: Aapke paas koi aisi list bani hui hai ki aapko pata hai ki haan in in cities ka agar order aaya, kaisa bhi order aaya main kar sakta hu?
Customer: Ji ji kahi se bhi aaye ho kar denge hum.
Executive: Haan ji. Toh aap kya kaam karo na ye important hai kyunki isse kya hai ki aap jitni achche se apni profile sambhal ke rakhoge utne hi zyada chances hai ki aapko na irrelevancy nahi hogi. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Toh aap kya karoge ki jitni bhi cities mein aap deal karte ho, theek hai? Utni cities ko chhod ke jitni baaki cities bachi ruk jao ye bhi main dekh ke bata deti hu. Ah.
Executive: Haan mummy.
Executive: Haan ji, ek second. Haan ji. Toh aapki jitni bhi cities hai jaha pe aap deal nahi karte ho aur aapko waha ki lead aa gayi hai. Ye kuch nahi hai aapko bas ek process follow karna hota hai aur agar aapka iska process aapke haath mein baith gaya toh aap khud se hi kar loge ye har baar iske liye mujhe connect nahi karna padega. Matlab connect karne mein mujhe dikkat nahi hai par aap soch rahe ho ki main matlab same hi cheez main har city ke liye bataungi toh aap bhi irritate ho jaoge ki ye cheez mujhe already pata hai main kar lunga. Samajh rahe ho?
Executive: Toh hum isko jitna simple rakhte hai utna theek hai. Mujhe bas ye batao aap abhi meeting pe aa sakte ho kya?
Customer: Nahi madam abhi toh main kahi aaya hua hu side pe.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap kal aa sakte hai?
Customer: Haan kal aa jaunga morning mein.
Executive: Theek hai. Main aapko kal call karti hu. Main aapko ye dikha dungi ki ye kaise kaise karna hota hai. Toh phir isko theek theek wgera karke phir uske baad karte hai. Aapka ye Makrana aapne already filter mein add kar rakha tha ya nahi kar rakha tha?
Customer: Ye nahi Makrana mein hum deal nahi karte.
Executive: Nahi nahi wohi main bol rahi hu ki aapne not relevant mein Makrana kar rakha tha ya nahi kar rakha tha?
Customer: Kar rakha hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur ek Pune aur batana bas.
Executive: Pune mein karte ho aap deal?
Customer: Ji karte hain.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh phir ye ah 6 inch marble border patti isme deal karte ho?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: 6 inch marble border patti ispe deal karte ho?
Customer: Border patti mein nahi karte woh toh paras wala aa gaya pura.
Executive: Ji. Theek hai, theek hai. Slab ka karte hai hum.
Executive: Ji. Toh maine aapki list nikali hui hai puri ki puri ki aapne abhi pichle ek mahine mein kis kis cheez ko not interested mark kiya hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Hum ye baith ke kal kaam karte hai. Main aapko kal call karti hu. Aap bas mujhe ye timing bata dijiye main aapko kab call karu meeting ke liye?
Customer: Ji ji. Morning mein kar lijiye aap 11:00, 11:30 baje.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, sure, sure. Main karti hu. Theek hai. Toh aapko kal karti hu main. Thank you Naseem ji, have a nice day.
Customer: Have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has unmarked leads.

- Needs assistance with filter settings.

- Irrelevant leads due to incorrect filters.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of filters.

- Executive offered to guide customer on call.

- Meeting scheduled to fix filter settings.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- filters, leads, profile, cities, meeting
